actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1902(a) (14)(B)(1) of the Social Security Act to make optional certain cost-sharing fees now required to be paid by some individuals under medicaid.

summary.text: Makes optional the cost-sharing fees now required to be paid by enrollees under medicaid who were not receiving aid under, or who were not qualified under, a State plan.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1902(a) (14)(B)(1) of the Social Security Act to make optional certain cost-sharing fees now required to be paid by some individuals under medicaid.
